reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set!
reviewText: We have taken on an airplane and it survived well with no damage. It is light weight, very pretty and rolls smoothly. They hold a lot!!! Great value a day would buy again.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, Stylish, and Travel-Ready Luggage
reviewText: The Samsonite Centric 2 Hardside Expandable Luggage is durable and lightweight, featuring a stylish polycarbonate shell that resists scratches. Its 360-degree spinner wheels provide smooth mobility, and the expandable feature offers extra packing space, making it ideal for frequent travelers.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOOKS GREAT, BUT NOT YET USED
reviewText: Just got off a 7 day cruise to Alaska, and decided I needed a suitcase upgrade, as my old 2 wheel duffel would barely close on the contents, returning.The Samsonite arrived intact, big and beautiful, just as pictured.The wheels, locks, extendable handle and zippers all work smoothly, so am good to go.I've read the surface scratches, which is disappointing, but a hard case that doesn't simply does not exist, I think, as the reviews on all the other models noted they did, as well, so just have to live with it, I guess.As long as it remains in one piece, and contains the contents, with working wheels and zippers, I'll be satisfied.The lock system seems a little fragile, just being the zipper tips inserted into holes, with a latching bar running thru it.However, it's not a concern for me, as my duffel had no lock, and I never pack anything other than clothes, toiletries and a book or two, so not a prime target for potential thievery, I think.Overall, I really like it, at this point.I'm hopefully traveling to Kenya in February, and will return to edit this review when I return.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with this set!
reviewText: We purchased this three piece hard side set to replace an older two piece Samsonite soft side set we’ve had for many years and needed to be retired. We always have had soft side luggage but thought we’d try the hard side version for a change and found this Centric 2 set for what we thought was a pretty good price.On receiving the luggage, our first thought was that the outer hard shell was more flexible than we anticipated and I was skeptical about the durability of the luggage. But all three pieces made their maiden cross country plane trip intact and fairly unscathed. Yes, the luggage had some light scratches and scuffing, but that was minor, and the zippers, wheels, handles all came through with flying colors. I read a couple of other reviews where the zippers were an issue but I think they are pretty heavy duty and we had no issues with them. Same for the wheels. The wheels stick out more than those on our old set but they appear pretty solid and roll like a dream.We stuffed all three pieces full for our trip but really packed a lot in the large suitcase and it was a little tough to close. Not horrendously so but I was concerned about the zipper breaking so I thought it might be a good idea to use the expandable feature. Nice idea, that took the excess strain off of the zipper, but I found that the top flexed way too much and I thought this might create more of a problem when the bag was loaded and unloaded off of the planes. So I zippered the expandable part back up and we made it home without mishap.PROS: We really appreciate the fact that all three pieces fit inside of each other for combined storage, something that our old set couldn’t do. We like the TSA friendly locks and how they are out of the way. The interior zippered compartments are very nice. The wheels, as mentioned earlier, seem pretty durable and roll like a dream. Pretty light weight, no where near as heavy as our old soft side set.CONS: Okay, this is nitpicking, but the outer shell will get scratched and scuffed. Anybody that has flown knows how tough baggage handling can be. And the description does say “scratch resistant” not scratch proof. I thought our bags came through our trip pretty well. Lastly, not that this matters to us but the carry on has a built in charger for phones, tablets, etc. but you have to buy the battery separately. We don’t care and will probably never use it but just letting you know incase you missed that in the description.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best luggage I ever had
reviewText: Great price, quality and it arrives really quickly. They look amazing...love the color and its materials.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect 10/10
reviewText: It’s large enough to pack for 2 weeks worth if you really needed to. The separate top compartment is perfect for shoes, underwear, socks and a toiletry bag. Finally, the design just looks good and the purple orchid color makes it very easy to spot in baggage claim.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars ZIPPER keeps busting open! And TONS of scratches and even damage !
reviewText: This is supposed to be SAMSONITE! Best of the best! From the very first time I’ve used this set - NOTHING but black scratches all over both pieces! And then the unthinkable - the zipper on the smaller one has busted open after coming off the airplane and down the luggage conveyor not once, not twice - but now THREE TIMES! Absolutely unacceptable! This should never happen! What makes things worse is even though there’s a 10 year warranty - Will Samsonite replace it? NOPE - they expect me to “ship” it to them and then IF they can repair it - and they feel it’s “under warranty” they’ll fix it and if not - I can opt to have it repaired at my expense….UNACCEPTABLE! I paid too much money for these and to have service like that? Deplorable! Will never EVER buy Samsonite again!

reviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on November 14, 2024
reviewTitle: Great Carry On Luggage
reviewText: I love everything about this carry on bag. The colour is beautiful. The wheels are durable, spinnable and easy to walk with at the airport. Easy and organized storage in the interior. I do miss an outside zippered pocket that I had in my soft sided luggage but I have another personal bag that fits over the extendible handles that I can use for this purpose. After 3 airport trips using overhead compartments and several close to home trips, this bag still looks like new.

reviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on October 22, 2024
reviewTitle: Light weight
reviewText: These are super light, but spacious and sturdy. The wheels are smooth also. We traveled to Europe and Asia 3 times and all good.

reviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on October 2, 2024
reviewTitle: Beautiful
reviewText: Received lots of positive comments on the colour and style of the suitcases - very sturdy and good quality ! Got an amazing price for both due to sale for these suitcases

reviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on May 21, 2024
reviewTitle: ¡Excelente calidad y precio!
reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Pronto tendrán su primer uso, pero por ahora se ven espectacular. Son 3 maletas de muy buena calidad, la grande es realmente grande lo cual es genial. La pequeña tiene un compartimento y cable para poner una batería externa (power bank) y una salida USB (tipo A) en la parte de afuera para uso directo. El color es azul grisáceo muy lindo. El precio no tiene sentido! Muy buenas :)

reviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on September 19, 2023
reviewTitle: Broken wheel on first plane ride
reviewText: For the price and name of this luggage I would have hoped the wheels would have withstood their first plane ride. Dent in the top of the suitcase as well. One of the zipper pulls has also broken off. :( I have used my $50 hard cover no name suitcase for over 10 years with zero damages and I was hoping a Samsonite would have outlasted the cheap one I used to use.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't Go Wrong with Samsonite!
reviewText: I've had good luck with the Samsonite brand. I had my last set for 16 years & they were heavily traveled with. This new set is same high quality as my last. Dimensions listed are true to size. I haven't had any issues with the carry-on size having to be checked. I like that the inside is open - the wheels & handle don't impede the space, so plenty of room for your things. Lightweight & easy to maneuver. Worth the purchase!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly, best new luggage to travel internationally
reviewText: I inherited some old school luggage for my mother. It was a very sturdy but older collection of American Tourister luggage and it died on me my last travel moving from the states to Germany because of my job so I took a gamble and bought this luggage. My luggage was overweight by normal standards of any American based airlines, but they look the best my luggage have ever been traveling. I had some liquids in my checked bags. Nothing broke. You just had to dust off the dust and they looked brand new. Honestly, for the price I paid. I’m mad I didn’t buy two sets, but these are definitely my favorite luggage.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality!
reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Awesome set! Fabulous quality, thick and sturdy but still lightweight, plenty of expansion and pockets. The wheels seem really durable and high quality, and the color is fun and easy to spot! I’ve always had great success with samsonite products and love their 10 yr warranty. Very happy with my purchase!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2024
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not right for me
reviewText: The quality was great and the wheels worked just fine. The color was dark enough not to show stains but not black like every other suitcase coming down the baggage shoot. The only problem was it’s bigger than the airlines recommended size. I am not sure the airline would call you on the size as long as you were under their 50 pound max but in researching reviews, I found that if they do object, the fines can be quite steep so unfortunately I returned it and the search is on for another

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful set if luggage!
reviewText: I bought this 3pc set of Samsonite luggage on Prime day and paid $247, regularly $510 so I'm very happy with the value I received. They swivel easily and have a handle on top,side, and bottom to make lifting them easier. The smallest one has a handle on the top & side only. Plenty of room to hold all your necessities for travel!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price

reviewText: Nice and lightweight. The handles and wheels make this really easy to move. Plus, the color is really pretty. The three sizes ensure we always have the right amount of space for a trip.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024

I'll need to be careful of weight limits when we fly! They seemed sturdy and easy to find when it was time to grab our luggage at the end of the cruise.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST GIFT EVER!
reviewText: BEST GIFT EVER!I bought the Steve Madden Designer Luggage Collection as a gift for my businessman son, who travels frequently, and I am filled with pride observing it being used! The set is pure quality, with a five year guarantee. The two suitcases expand, allowing for greater volume, and the smaller case can be hand carried or strolled. (It’s even being used as a gym bag!). The wheels are sturdy and provide flawless 360 degree movement, even over uneven concrete. The set is lightweight, functional, sturdy and attractive. Truly, this is a very good purchase!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pretty set
reviewText: This luggage set was bought as a grad gift. Very pleased with design and overall look. Rolls very easily and pivots nicely. Seems sturdy and comes with a warranty. Thinking I should get another set for myself!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2018
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Luggage But Color In Person Not the Same As Picture
reviewText: Purchased this set for my wife. She say: I fell in love with the picture of this set. It looked elegant and sassy. We bought this set b/c the carry on bag and checked bag fits size for American Air. Small bag is too big to use as a personal item but ordered anyway b/c it is cute and can be used for ground travel. Set came quickly and fits inside each other. Baggage is large inside and seems to be well made. Love the little tassels on the front. Did not notice any weird smells other posters had mentioned. THE BAD: The compression straps inside the suitcase are not elastic. I've never seen that before and it didn't work well. But the really bad is that the color looks different in person vs the picture and that’s the reason for 4 stars. Luscious Silver set has a purple tint. Looks like the cloth inside a casket. Makes them look like cheap/knockoff bags. In the picture its's silver. I'm going to attach a pic as well but it doesn't really show up purple in my pic either. Believe me in person it is obvious. And you will see in the pic the zipper isn't sewn on straight. And the leather(?) around one of the zippers is flaking off like the zipper got stuck on it. Just not high quality. I kept the bags anyway b/c we had travel plans. Have flown with the set twice and they held up well. They are easy to spot on luggage carousel. The cloth did have a few picks in fabric after flying and handling but still looks ok. Wheels roll in all directions well and smoothly. A little harder to roll on carpet but on other floors I could roll easily. Happy w/set except for the color.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2020
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight
reviewText: I purchased the Steve Madden Luggage because I wanted something jazzy for my Africa trip. The luggage is gorgeous. However, the TA from the airport were ruff with my luggage. Landing in Africa, I went to get my luggage, I discovered a tear and rip. I immediately reported to the claims departed. They gave me he**. Luckily for me, I were able to pull my receipt from Amazon showing the luggage were new. The airlines did pay for the damaged luggage.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2018
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy with this purchase!
reviewText: I rarely take the time to submit reviews, but felt compelled to in this case. I did a LOT of searching for a new luggage set for a two-week girls' trip through Scotland & Ireland, and finally decided on this set - I'm so happy I did! On & off the tour bus, approx. seven different hotel changes, four flights, and they held up beautifully. I used the smallest as my carry-on bag, and it was the perfect size. On a smaller plane they made others store their carry-on bags separately, but I was able to keep mine with me because it was just small enough. The largest bag is expandable and I was able to (with the help of packing cubes) cram a lot in and still stay under 50 lbs. A great price and so stylish! I felt quite fancy rolling these pieces through the airport ;) and they stood out from the rest. The only issue was that I put too many items in the clear pocket in the smallest bag and the plastic pulled away from the fabric on one side - just a caution to others who may buy this set - but I definitely still recommend it!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2024
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible product - cheaply made
reviewText: After the 1st use, the handle on the largest piece of luggage broke. Amazon did replace it for us and the replacement works, however, this product is so cheaply made that the handle on this one is about to break after 1 use.The handle on the carry-on piece also broke after a few uses.Very disappointing - this whole set was basically a huge waste of money. I wish I never ordered it.I'm only leaving 1 star because I can't leave 0.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2019
reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Need Better Quality Control
reviewText: I'm definitely not impressed with this set. The only pluses are the look & pockets. The blue is incredible and so gorgeous in person, the pictures do it no justice at all. I ordered two sets (first set had a lining zipper sewed on so wrong it wouldn't zip up the last 5 inches and left a gaping hole through to where the handle pulls up) and both sets had some kind of manufacturing issues. The stitching is a little loose and on the second set they completely went off the fabric of the expansion zipper for about three inches. Pull handle on the smallest case is wobbly. I only kept and used because I ran out of time to mess around shopping for another set. Definitely not the quality I was expecting for the price I paid. But they're very roomy and function well.P.S. I have never left a review but considering the crap I went through, I figured it was worth warning people.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Quality, and Unique
reviewText: I am so pleased with this set! I’ve flown twice with this since my purchase, and checked it in both times. With the very welcome plastic protector that comes with it, it kept the suitcase in beautiful condition. It wheels effortlessly, plus fits on top of my mobility walker easily. This set looks and feels like high-end luggage, and is absolutely beautiful. It’s sturdy, but also lightweight. It’s very stylish and classic, but still bold and unique. I got so many compliments from flight attendants, airline employees, and passengers on the matching train case. I wore it as a purse, cross-body style, and it fit under the seat. When I got asked, and said I got it on Amazon, they were always surprised. Don’t hesitate to get this if you are trying to decide. I take all reviews with a grain of salt, but trust me- mind is real. I love it!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I loved the style of the luggage, very stylish and vintage. They were easy to navigate with and carry. The material was excellent and the leather looked authentic, not cheap. So far, they've proved to be very durable. They also arrived quickly,literally the next day after I ordered them. They were packaged safely and even came with something to cover them for when you store them away.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I bought it!
reviewText: I bought these cases primarily on looks and bc the sizes work for air travel. I was a little concerned that they would not wear well, because they were described as "light-weight" luggage. But, my fear were unfounded.The cases are lovely, are very well built, and I appreciate the features of the straps to hold one side, and the zipped dust cover on the other side. And the fact that most of it can fit together when not in use is a great space-saver.I put some mink oil on it to age it a little and also to help it resist dirt and scuffs. I plan to clean it with saddle soap. Not because any of this is real leather, but because I already have those products and they will work fine on these synthetic materials.Overall, I think this is a very well-designed set of luggage and I'm glad I bought it.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love them.
reviewText: Love this.. This is second purchase of another set.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2024
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviewText: I used this item once and it’s falling apart at the seems. Amazon, nor the manufacture will give me a refund for the money spent. Extremely dissatisfied.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I love them
reviewText: They have a good look to them and have survived several air flights and cruises. I put the clear plastic protector they gave me. I think that makes them be more careful with my luggage. This is my favorite luggage by far.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2022
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded expectations
reviewText: I purchased this carry-on because I loved the retro look. I wasn't expecting it to be well-made and was a bit nervous about quality. I was pleasantly surprised that it seems to be fairly sturdy and is extremely easy to maneuver. The little case is useless and looks like a doll case. I used the rolling bag on a recent trip and had no issues - it was easy to roll through the airport and the plane aisle, and fit well in the overhead bin on the plane. Great purchase!

reviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on October 3, 2022
reviewTitle: Works amazing
reviewText: I love this set, it worked perfectly, I filled it to its max and had no issues. It’s easily the nicest set and best quality set I’ve ever had.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but pretty
reviewText: The big suitcase fit about a week's worth of clothes without shoes. The smaller one is really small, like the size of two shoeboxes I guess

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful
reviewText: I’m so glad I got the plastic covers. I’d hate for the airport to scuff up this beautiful set. It looks exactly how it looks. I love how easy it rolls.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so many compliments
reviewText: My last name is Lemons, and I am obsessed with Lemon decor and apparel. I got this luggage as a Mother's Day Gift. I LOVE IT!!!!!! It is super cute and elegant. I get so many compliments!!! Would definitely recommend!!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2024
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this set of luggage!!!
reviewText: SO PRECIOUS!! I got it to replace my old cheetah print suitcase, so cute and have gotten so many compliments!! it come with a clear case to protect the larger luggage, which is super convenient considering the airlines don’t care about your stuff! The cover saved it from several scuffs already, just from my trip to and from Cali. Only downside is that it’s not the most durable material, it’s more like a faux leather which I kinda was hoping it was printed on a canvas material. The faux leather gets “chipped” kinda bad if something pokes it. It’s not expandable, but it has a good amount of space. The wheels are great and easy to navigate around. The pattern is amazing and super bright!!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this luggage
reviewText: I bought this set for myself last year before going on vacation. It is so gorgeous. My daughter was jealous because she loved it so I bought her a set last year. And now I'm buying this set for my other daughter for Christmas this year. The price has come down since I bought mine which is awesome. I do not fly very often this is just more for weekend trips and it's perfect. Definitely not big enough for over a week. The matching case is so adorable I would have bought it by itself.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute
reviewText: This is super cute and worth it..It even has a combination lock so people can’t just go in your stuff🙌🏾🙌🏾😍😍😍😍I love it

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great piece
reviewText: These are very nice. Well made. Appear as pictured. The wheels roll very smoothly both when in upright position and when tilted. The smaller "personal item" comes with a long shoulder strap for convenient carrying and a short strap that keeps it resting snug on top of your roll-around luggage without falling should you not want to carry it separately. It also has really sturdy studs on one side of it that prop it upright and keep it from sliding around when stowed under the seat in front of you on a flight. Have only had it for a few weeks and two trips so I don't know how it stands up to time, but it looks like it will hold up nicely. The larger bag also comes with a plastic luggage protector, which was a nice surprise.I got no less than 4 complements about my classy looking luggage on my most recent trip, mostly from flight attendants. 100% would buy again and probably will by more pieces. My only grievance is i wish there were more color options. Navy and white or light grey would be to die for!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegante
reviewText: Muy cómodas

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great
reviewText: I bought it for work the weight is perfect the Maneuverability is great 4 wheels or you can slide it like a 2 wheel stands well the zipper so smooth to open and close the space although it seems small is very spacious quality is great and for the value i got it for is worth it!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars luggage is light weight BUT the wheels break easily
reviewText: I purchased this luggage set in October of 2022 right before a trip to the Caribbean. It is lightweight and roomy and seemed like it would be perfect for our yearly trip It survived 3 flights before the spinner wheel separated from the bottom of the suitcase, basically making it useless for travel. I contacted TravelPro via their website with the pictures above asking them to repair or replace the luggage - I have yet to receive a reply from them. TRAVELPRO appears to have a good reputation in the luggage industry, but, as of now, I would take that with a grain of sat. VERY DISSAPPOINTED IN THIS LUGGAGE AND TRAVELPRO'S NON EXISTENT CUSTOMER SERVICE AND NON-REPLY TO MY REQUEST.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
reviewText: Nice set of luggage

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good
reviewText: These are very good bags. However, I decided to return and reorder Travelpro bags in double wheel spinners because well . . . I’m old! Ha! And I need all the help I can get! These roll beautifully but I went for a little more expense and even easier wheels. So you can make your trade off! Bon Voyage!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2024
reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not hold up well
reviewText: These bags did NOT hold up like the MaxLite 5s I have. All three of my rollaboard bags (this one and 2 MaxLite 5s) packed with the same weight, and have taken the same journeys, the approximate same number of times.The under the seat bag tore within the first two months. Now the rollaboard handle on this one is trashed after only 9 months of use. Even if I had purchased the warranty on these bags, I would still chose to replace them with the MaxLite 5 instead. This model simply does not hold up nearly as well.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great look and size of these. I haven’t use them yet, but I hope that it is as durable as it looks.
reviewText: The dept of these cases are great

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised!
reviewText: Quality, quality, quality!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Great at Maneuverability
reviewText: UPDATE: After spending a significant amount of time looking into warranty information on this set, I've discovered that this is NOT true Travelpro luggage.It's made by Travelpro, but it turns out it's a low quality set made for discount retailers. It's not even listed on their website and appears to have no warranty backing. I have had Travelpro for several years so, when the time came for a new set, I hopped on Amazon, found a set that I liked (and was happy to have scored a great deal) and purchased it (shame on me, I guess). I was completely unaware that Travelpro had watered down their product line and were pushing substandard items.It feels like a terrible bait and switch from a company that used to mean quality and durability. If you can, spend the extra money for the Platinum or Maxlite lines or switch brands completely, like I may be doing soon.ORIGINAL REVIEW: I love Travelpro luggage and this is my second set from Amazon (I travel about 40% of the year) but this set is just really frustrating me.The carryon tips over with anything set on top. Neither case rolls particularly easily, but the carryon is a nightmare. The wheels seem to "snag" constantly and the whole thing tips over while I'm rolling it, even on flat hard surfaces.I'm trying to look into warranty options, hoping I got a lemon and it's not a flaw with all of this line. I've been shopping other brands recently due to the issues I'm having traveling with this set.

reviewText: I bought it for work the weight is perfect the Maneuverability is great 4 wheels or you can slide it like a 2 wheel stands well the zipper so smooth to open and close the space although it seems small is very spacious quality is great and for the value i got it for is worth it!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
reviewText: This luggage is beautiful. I have been wanting to purchase this for a year now. I tried to make my photos as detailed as possible because the reviews I’ve seen just didn’t have everything I wanted to know/see. This is the carry on 20in with the little carrying case. The protective cover does come with it! I was worried it only came with the big ones. I intentionally took my photos in front of the fridge so you can get a good idea of the size. It is not as tall as my freezer. This carry on would suit me perfectly for a week long trip. I do not do checked luggage, we all know how airports handle luggage. I don’t recommend getting this suitcase if you intend to check it. This should be carry on only, for trains, or road trips in ANY size. It is sturdy but something this elegant needs to be cared and looked after. If you want a travel bag you can beat up, look elsewhere. This is the first luggage set I have ever bought and I am so happy with it. I can’t wait to serve looks in the airport.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great visuals and durability.
reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Due to the material it is definitely on the heavier side! However, the visuals is so pretty! It fit majority of the things I wanted. I wished it had more pockets but it's also fine. It came with a rain guard as well. At first i was wondering what the random plastic bag was for. The handbag does have a small flaw where when it unlocks it'll get stuck with the handle. But you just have to angle it to lock it. The wheels are so smooth! Spins really nice and quiet.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
reviewText: I’ve never owned a suitcase before so when I saw this one I had to get! The suitcase itself is 21.5in long (including wheels). The inside is roughly 6in deep (18in long). The carryon bag is roughly 4in deep, 12in long. The wheels are really smooth, I was walking in a circle with it in my kitchen & it didn’t want to tip over or anything (it was empty). The pull handle has a button that you push down to adjust the height of it. It also has a water proof cover for the suitcase (not the carryon) & a bag for the inside to cover your clothes (so they don’t fly around I guess?). It’s also just extremely cute & I can’t wait to use it!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very striking luggage!
reviewText: I got a lot of compliments from this luggage. The only down side is the open and closure. Not smooth like with a zippered back. It has a combination lock closure as well as some faux snaps. It looks snazzy but a little awkward to close, I love the vintage look and the fact that it is attention grabbing. Looks expensive. Would like the suitcase and the train case to be a little larger.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wish they were made in the US
reviewText: Quality seems fine for me so far. I travel a lot so I'll only use these for carry on and personal items. I don't trust the checked luggage handling being kind to my bags. They'd get beat up. I use Samsonite for my checked luggage.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Probably a good weekend luggage, travel by car only!!
reviewText: We purchased the suitcase and carry on, it looks great and arrived packaged well. However, the carry on straps broke before we even made it to the airport counter to check-in. Upon arrival to our destination, the suitcase lock was broken and the only thing holding it together was the plastic cover that came with the luggage…thank God for that! Seriously disappointed in the durability but everything else is great.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful not practical
reviewText: Loved this set when I saw it and HAD to have it. It was even prettier in person when I got it. That’s the good part. The bad part far outweighs the beauty of it. If you’re going to use it on vacation make sure you bring two other bags because these hold nothing. Normal suitcases have 2 sides you can load up stuff in, this one only has one side and half of it has the metal roller bars in it and the other side had a “net” that you put some nail polish bottles in it and MAYBE a book if it wasn’t a big book. For a normal four day trip I had to bring all four suitcases, (I bought the big one which had a little one in it and then I bought the smaller one which also had a little one in it). Then, if you’re dumb enough like me and brought it on a plane and let the thugs that throw around your luggage, Will most definitely ruin it. The very first time I used it, when I got to my destination and saw what was left on my bag that came off the carousel was unbelievable! It’s seriously looked like I had dragged it around for years. All the rose gold snaps and locks were all scratched up, the white straps that snap close, one of them is gone. it’s so flimsy and so not durable that I would say the only thing it is good for is to make your room look prettier. It’s not super sturdy, the rollers were not very good, I had to lift it over every threshold because it wouldn’t go over. I’m keeping the two little bags for carry-ons but the other two are ruined. So don’t spend 250 or $500 for this beautiful luggage unless you’re just leaving it out for show So you will not be as disappointed as I was.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most beautiful luggage I have ever seen and especially ever owned!
reviewText: As soon as I saw this I knew I had to have it. This particular one is beautiful with rose gold accents. Loved the extra plastic wardrobe bag and the attach on accesory bag. The rollers seemed very durable and easy to roll around the floors. I am very nervous about taking this stunning luggage through international flights in February to Paris, Venice, and the Greek islands but I guess I can let you know more about durability then!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Set, No Problems!
reviewText: I've had this set for over a year now and absolutely no problems. Traveled about 5x using them. One of the times I used it for my destination wedding and transported a lot of my wedding decor. Held up well, and don't see any signs of "stress" on the zipper lining or anywhere else. Hope they come back with the 3 pc in Red.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality
reviewText: I'm really impressed with the quality of these. The interior is beautifully constructed and the fabric for the liner is far better than what you'd expect from a luggage set that's less than $200. I'm going on my first cruise at the end of the month and I'm hoping that I'm just as impressed with how they survived being tossed around and that the overall construction is just as good as the interior. PS - I love the red color! My only negative so far is that the shipping box was cheap quality and it was delivered falling apart and broken open on the end with the wheels. On initial examination the product appears to be undamaged.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Product for the Price
reviewText: The luggage has a great look, so many compliments from people asking about this product. Very sturdy and was able to fit my duffle bag on the top to pull along as I walked. Lightweight for me but Spirit Airline did not think so. Yes, I would purchase the luggage again.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!!
reviewText: I purchase this trio of suitcases during Amazon’s big sale. I love the jaunty red colour, and the suitcases are sturdy but lightweight, and the wheels can turn on a dime!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value
reviewText: Great quality at a fair price!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Value
reviewText: Now that my two-piece set has been all over the Mediterranean with me, I am delighted to say I am so happy I finally found my perfect fit! Not only are both cases really attractive, which is important to me, but they are expandable and the interiors can be fastened shut to keep your items/clothes secure. The wheels worked well for me esp since I am somewhat handicapped. The cases both have exterior locks and adjustable handles.And, "No" I don't work for the company--I just really like these suitcases!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Suitcases, Impressed.
reviewText: Let me tell you that these suitcases withstood all the banging and tossing that it went through when I traveled to the Mediterranean from the flight to the cruise ship! Very impressed.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mis-advertised
reviewText: Product description says 3 piece set. Only one suitcase arrived. Very disappointed. Won't be able to recap the high shipping fee on this one either. Don't be fooled.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
reviewText: The color of this product is absolutely gorgeous. The space for this product is only good for a 7 day travel. It’s not lightweight, value for money is on point - I would definitely purchase again so I can have more packing space. I normally travel for two weeks to three weeks to the Caribbean.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and functional!
reviewText: I originally purchased the red mock croc train case, and liked it so much, I decided to get this luggage to match! My pictures don't do it justice - the color is pretty "French lipstick red". I was happy to find the large spinner case is lightweight. It has 2 study handles (one on the top, one on the side) and the wheels move very easily. It comes with a heavy duty plastic case to protect it when wheeling it in inclement weather (one pic shows how the plastic cover attaches with Velcro underneath the case). I found that the large case will hold enough items for about a week's travel, and the small case holds a change of clothes for overnight. Each case has pockets sewn in to hold smaller clothing or toiletry items. The small case comes with 2 additional straps - one shoulder strap which is adjustable, and a strap that fits over the handle of the larger case, to hold the small case in place, so you can roll both cases at once. I'm really happy with this purchase!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique and Beautiful
reviewText: My daughter has an upcoming international trip with her school that she needed her own luggage for. I told her to get something different and a pattern that would stand out from all of the other luggage at the airport. We could not find anything that she liked locally. She found this set online and really liked it. The pictures really do not do it justice. In case you are trying to match it to existing luggage, it has a cream background with a peachy orange and purple map pattern. The inside is gray and off-white stripes. The luggage seems to be very sturdy and rolls very nice. The small case is a great size for her toiletries.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, but much smaller than expected
reviewText: Initially, I only wanted a 3-piece set to include the 26”, 20”, and 12”. However, after messaging the seller, I was told that they only sell the bags in sets of two (26 and 12 or 20 and 12) and not individually. Urecity offered to refund me the difference for purchasing both bundles of two, and I still was able to keep the extra 12” bag. The 26” got here first, and my first impression was that it is smaller (more narrow) than I expected. It does seem like the size is more suitable for children, but vintage-style suitcases/trunks ARE smaller than the modern style of luggage. I fell in love with the historical map design, and I could not find any other suitcases this classy and appealing with a similar design. I debated on returning them because of the small size, but I have decided to keep them because they are so unique and stylish. The dust covers and clear bag protectors are luxe. I plan to travel with them later this month, and I will update this review with more photos and maybe some video footage of how much I was able to fit in them and how they’ve held up. I plan to check the 26 and carry on the 20 and one 12. The bags look so much bigger in this photo than in person. If they were able to make the top of each bag as deep as the bottom for extra packing space, they would be five stars in my book. I’m crossing my fingers that they hold up on my trip. I may purchase some compression packing cubes.**POST TRAVEL UPDATE** I ended up returning the entire set because I decided that they weren’t for me. They were just too small for my needs. I had to pack everything carefully to make it fit. They did survive being checked for a round trip with a layover going both ways. I ended up checking the carry-on and the 26” and I didn’t have any issues. The only damage was to the clear protective case. One corner of the plastic got ripped, but better that than the bag itself. The bags got a lot of compliments and looks. They are indeed beautiful bags, but they are not something you want to buy to pack a lot of clothing and shoes. I’d probably consider a carry-on size as a makeup bag or something. If only they could increase volume of the bag! The company has superb customer service. I really wanted these to work. I hope my review helps.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new fave carryon
reviewText: When I saw this design and the vintage trunk look, I had to have it. I got so many compliments walking through the airport because it's just that gorgeous. I love that both pieces came in its own dust bag for storage. And then there is the clear luggage cover that goes over the carry on which was also a plus. I normally buy luggage covers for my bags but since this had a really cool design I didn't want to cover it. I did use it as a carry on and did not check it because I know how the airlines are and I did not want them to damage my bag. So I cannot attest to the durability of it as checked piece but I would never check this, ever. The wheels roll smoothly and its quite spacious for a carryon. Hope this helps.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vintage luggage
reviewText: Luggage is nice and leather has held up nicely so far. Seems well made.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful vintage luggage
reviewText: I brought this vintage luggage set in French lipstick red to take on a trip to Miami while having a bbl surgery was able to fit in all my supplies I was very pleased it is a show stopper everyone loves it and got many compliments I love the style and color of it I can easily recognize it on the conveyor belt at the airport everyone want to borrow it the carry on is tsa approved I seen nothing like it beautiful would totally recommend

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I USED THIS LUGGAGE TWICE , STRAP WILL NOT BUCKLE IN AND NOW RIPPED
reviewText: WOULD LIKE A REFUND OR REPLACEMENT

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
reviewText: Looks exactly as pictured! I’ve travel twice now by train since purchasing it and I love this luggage! True to size, the handles are sturdy, I haven’t received any scratches yet but I’m looking forward to seeing how this hold up when I have to fly. The wheels are great the bag just glides! The handles are made well can pick up from different angles no issues. The color is gorgeous! Holds all 7 of my packing cubes with some room to spare. I easily packed a weekend worth of clothes in the large suitcase. Worth every penny I love this set.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m impressed

reviewText: I ordered this luggage as the price point was great, and it would be here on time for a work trip. It arrived on time, the packaging was great, and the luggage looked wonderful! The color is a bit lighter than expected, but I really like it!! I used the med sized bag for my trip, it held everything i needed and rolled great! Unfortunately the durability just isn't there. I had a direct flight (only 1.5 hours) and when I picked up my bag, it was already damaged. There is a hole and a couple gouges. I didn't expect it to be perfect, but this seems like alot for such a short trip!! I couldn't imagine what would have happened on a long haul, or if this was on/off loaded multiple times. I understand now, why quality luggage is much more expensive. You definitely get what you pay for!

The only thing I don't like is that they sometimes don't sit in the ear well. Sometimes when I fidget with it a little I'll find a nice snug position. If you need a couple of emergency pair or just aren't too picky and want some cheap, but totally acceptable earbuds, I say go for these.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Functional: A Review of AMAFACE Wireless Earbuds for Kids
reviewText: As a parent, finding the perfect pair of wireless earbuds for my six-year-old can be a challenge. However, the AMAFACE Wireless Earbuds have proven to be a delightful surprise, combining functionality with a touch of fun that kids love.**Kid-Friendly Design:** The red cartoon charging case immediately caught my child's eye, adding a playful touch to the overall experience. The vibrant color and cartoon design make these earbuds appealing to kids, encouraging them to use them regularly.**Easy Touch Control:** With touch control functionality, these earbuds are intuitive and easy for kids to use. My child has no trouble navigating the controls, whether it's adjusting the volume, skipping tracks, or answering calls. The simplicity of the touch controls enhances the overall user experience.**Stereo Sound:** Despite their compact size, these earbuds deliver impressive stereo sound quality. The audio is clear and crisp, allowing my child to enjoy their favorite music, podcasts, and videos without any distortion. The immersive sound experience keeps my child entertained and engaged for hours on end.**Comfortable Fit:** The in-ear design of these earbuds ensures a comfortable and secure fit, even during extended wear. My child has no complaints about discomfort or irritation, which is a testament to the ergonomic design of the earbuds.**Wireless Convenience:** With Bluetooth connectivity, these earbuds offer the freedom and flexibility to move around without being tethered to a device. Whether my child is playing outside or relaxing indoors, they can enjoy their favorite audio content without any hassle.**Long Battery Life:** The battery life of these earbuds is impressive, providing hours of continuous playback

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Moley, Kittens and Cannoli!
reviewText: To be honest, I purchased these wireless headphones for the cuteness factor. I wanted a pair of headphones to use while I am working at home but not connected by a wire so I wouldn't have to keep taking them off and on while getting up and walking away from my desk. How awesome is the case???!!!I wouldn't call myself an audiophile, but I have listened to enough music through headphones dating back all the way to the 2nd Sony Walkman WM-2 from 1981. Sound is relative and specific to each individual's ears. For me, I know what I like in a pair of headphones, crisp highs and full bodied sound. Not heavy bass that sounds muffled and distorted or tinny trebles. While these headphones won't compare to a top of the line Sennheisers, Sony or Bose, for the price point and the novelty - you get so much MORE than your money's worth. The sound is full bodied and so much clearer than any of the headphones in my collection.It feels like I am hearing so much more and picking up on nuances in the songs I have listened to for years, that I haven't heard before. I am hearing my music in a whole new way. :)They fit so well and are so comfortable, almost like they were made for my ears specifically. They fit as well in my ears as they do in the case. I forget they are on my ears. The range works well too, I can walk downstairs into my kitchen while connected to music at my desk in my bedroom and there is no stuttering of connection nor does it skip a beat.The instructions are ok, but doesn't explain what it means when the devil on the earbud turns blue when it's NOT pairing.I bought another pair for my daughter and am considering getting another pair as a backup.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are good but tricky at times
reviewText: I love the design of these headphones and the convenience of them. They do connect well to Bluetooth and the sound quality is good for the money! The battery life seems good but not sure yet. they seemed to have lasted longer enough for me to do my chores. I love that you can charge the earbuds inside of the animal themed case. And then the case you can charge with a USB plug that it comes with. It's very kawaii. The milk cat is adorable. The only thing I will complain about is they're not the easiest to use once they're in, bc they're touch activated on each side of the earbuds and sometimes when I'm just trying to shove the earbud back into my ear if I am bending down to clean and stuff it pauses the music or changes the volume and I'm like ahhh esp bc my phone isn't right there in my pocket haha. I guess I'm getting used to them and may have to use bigger earhole dudes or the little rubber protectors that go into your ear on the earbuds. It comes with those in different sizes which is nice. I'll probably have to switch to the bigger ones. But overall they're worth the money for wireless ear buds. I don't have the money to spend on apple airpods right now. These were an excellent solution and like I said the design is so cute. We'll see how long they last!!

reviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on February 1, 2021
reviewTitle: Überraschend gut!
reviewText: Als erstes: Ich muss zugeben, dass ich mich vom Design hab locken lassen. Daher waren meine Erwartungen nicht sehr hoch.Ich wurde aber mehr als positiv überrascht. Schon beim auspacken bekommt man das Gefühl von Qualität. Das Design ist unschlagbar, aber auch die Verarbeitung ist gut gelungen, überhaupt nicht klapprig oder unhandlich.Die Ladedose ist etwas groß, aber passt trotzdem in jede Jackentasche und ist ein lustiger Handschmeichler. Die Buds an sich paaren sich schnell und reagieren sofort auf die touch-Sensoren. Die sind zwar etwas hinderlich, wenn man die Earbuds zurecht rücken möchte, aber man gewöhnt sich schnell dran und kann dementsprechend umgreifen.Halten tuen sie in den Ohren gut und haben einen hohen Tragekomfort. Nur der rechte sitzt etwas lockerer und muss hin und wieder korrigiert werden, das kann aber auch an meinen Ohren liegen.Eher ungeeignet sind die buds aber zum entspannen oder einschlafen, da sie im liegen auf der Seite drücken und schnell weh tun.Die Soundqualität ist sehr gut, auf jeden Fall ausreichend für Rock, Metal, Elektro, EBM und Rap. Zu klassischer Musik etc. kann ich nichts sagen. Besonders ist, meiner Meinung nach, die mögliche Lautstärke. Die Kopfhörer haben selber die Möglichkeit, Lautstärke zu regulieren und das sehr hoch. Sind die Earbuds auf das maximale, brauch ich mein Handy nur halb so laut ein zu stellen. Beides auf maximum ist unaushaltbar laut. Kenne ich von anderen Bluetooth anders. Auch nur in dem Fall, hört man in der Umwelt etwas von der Musik.Andererseits, mit den Buds im Ohr ist man ungestört von Außenveräuschen, diese werden aber nicht voll unterdrückt. Also wichtige sachen, wie Sirenen oder rufen erreichen einen trotzdem.Zum eingebauten Mikrophon kann ich auch nur gutes sagen. Stimmen werden klar und deutlich aufgenommen, Hintergrundgeräusche stören kaum.Die Buds sind eigentlich normal bis "etwas" groß. Ich habe relativ kleine Ohren und die Earbuds dürften nicht größer sein. Daher würde ich eher sagen, dass sie nicht für Kinder geeignet sind.Zusammen gefasst: eine klare Kaufempfehlung!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Great - They Work Well for Small-Eared Adults Too!
reviewText: First of all, I was shocked to find out these were officially licensed Minecraft earbuds! I received them through the Amazon Vine Reviews Program and that's kind of a rarity in terms of review items, so that was pretty cool! I really like the creeper look (and I think it was a good idea to stick with just two colors and forego the additional shading to give them an overall cleaner look earbuds-wise).As earbuds, they work great! They actually DO go up in volume to a fairly high level - your phone just WARNS you about it sooner. So, as an adult, I can just go "pfft. Okay. Thanks." and crank it on up to a normal (or, dare I say, loud) level... but I'll get an alert at about the 2/4 volume mark instead of the 3/4 volume mark, if that makes sense. In other words: if you're buying these for an actual child, you'll still need to supervise their usage and/or actually parent them and explain volume control and why it's important.They come with three different sizes of ear tips, they create a really good seal (they block out so much outside noise!!), and the battery life is incredible. These are great!

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cool, novel design. Alright sound. A little hard to physically operate
reviewText: I’ve never seen anything like these earbuds. The case is open, and the earbuds sit flush inside. It‘s a singular situation where one will 100% 1.) Look cool and 2.) Lose their earbuds.You must charge them before using. One must also simultaneously press both earbuds at the same time for 3 seconds to turn on. One can press only 1 earbud for 3 seconds to turn off. I can tap them to pause. When I tap them again, they don’t turn back on. That’s frustrating. I am not even going to try to adjust the volume via the earbud. When I put them in the case and take them back out, they immediately start playing what I was just listening to. That’s cool.When I take them out of my ears, I take pictures, and do all sorts of things in any app that’s open at the time. It’s hard to control the buttons while just holding them or placing them somewhere.I like that three sizes of rubber ear tips come included. I took the largest size. They fit in my ears well. The case shows how much charge the earbuds/case has. The light turns off when it’s fully charged. When it’s charging, it blinks. More blinks means it has more charge. Less blinks, less charge. I took a picture of this described in the directions.For the novelty, these are cool. I’m taking them traveling with me. Wish me luck I don’t lose them.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for kids!
reviewText: The only reason I could see these being for children is that they do not go very loud. Which is fine and with the great noise suppression and amazing sound quality the high volume isn't needed! So if you are a Guardians fan or in the market for wireless ear buds, these will do just fine! I love the case design, different than most sealed cases is kind of a nice "breath of fresh air". I have had no issues other than initial pairing. I was impatient and connected to both earbuds separately when I should have let them connect to each other first. It didn't take long, I am just quick on the trigger. LolFitment is comfortable out of the box, but comes with different tips if needed.Touch controls work well.I did notice that if I covered my ears the noise canceling would cancel out my music so it definitely works!Call clarity seemed decent on both ends.I did not test maximum battery life but did use for a few hours at maximum volume and still had 60% battery remaining.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Who Doesn’t Love Guardians Of The Galaxy
reviewText: Recently, my daughter needed some new wireless earbuds, and I was not going to shell out for another high priced piece of fruit. That being said, I was searching Amazon, and came across these guardians of the galaxy earbuds.I don’t know about you, but I love comic books. I pick these up on a whim, hoping that my daughter would like them, but secretly, hoping that she would hate them, so I could keep them myself. Sure enough, she wanted plain white ones, and I got to keep these designer, guardian headphones. Dad win!That being said, the headphones charge up in an hour or two, and we easily give you 5 to 6 hours of consistent use before needing to be charged. They look stylish and fit well in the ears, however, the case feels a little cheap, and I don’t like the holes that the earbuds stick out of. I prefer a completely enclosed case.Overall, the price point was pretty good, and the earbuds seem to be a quality. The sound is decent and on par with all of the other $30 earbuds I’ve purchased in the past.

In my ears they fit perfectly fine and sealed nicely.The sound quality is pretty good for a set of buds that are under 30 dollars, The highs were fairly clear but had some distortion on the top end, the mids were a bit muddy and the lows lacked any real punch but this was what I had expected given the price.Overall given the price, the design, and the features this is a solid 5 star product

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Even worse than i thought they were.
reviewText: DONT BUY THESE!Just got them today, havent had the chance to use them yet. Earbud case wasnt even secure in box and rattleing around and case's hinge is very loose and doesnt seem stable at all. Very flimsy feeling. Not to sure about quality of item.EDIT: Ive used them now. Not comfortable for "small" ears like many reviews say and the plastic on the outside of the earbuds is cheap and sharp in some places, so it can catch on your ear when putting them in and pulling them out. I dont use the ear plug things cause they wont fit my ears if they are attached, and even without them they are a bit to big for my ears and have fallen out due to that reason.They do not work properaly, as if you walk more than 10 feet way from your device(or through a door/another floor) they will start to static, and then the one further from the device will turn off while the closer one cuts out here and there. And if you go more than that they will disconnect and wont auto reconnect without maunally going in and connecting them. Shoot ive had them cut out in the same room at work and it wasnt that big of a room.When first connected (everytime) they automatically turn it up full volume or "maximum volume" as it will say so watch for that. And if you even slightly touch them they will either turn off the music, or turn up the volume. Not that the max volume is even that loud. And if you tap them again they wont do anything, no matter how long you wait or how many times you tap them again.Sound wise they are NOT noise cancelling, and very echo-ey. I used them at work(i work in a factory) and i could still hear all my co-workers over my music with one earbud in. i also used them while powerwashing my house (with both earbuds in) and not only was my washer louder than the loudest i could turn up the volume but my neighbor could still talk over both my earbuds and my powerwasher, and he was just talking in a normal tone.Needless to say i dont know why it has all these 5 star reviews (unless they were paid reviews) none of the things worked properally for me and all the reviews deceived me into thinking this was a good product. I might as well have paid a dollar more for the other earbuds i previously had.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2024
reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great disappointment, broken item, broken box, burnt smell, does not charge or produce sound
reviewText: The charging case lid had broken notches, the charging case smells burnt, and the earbuds produce no sound.I bought these Lilo and Stitch Bluetooth headphones with great excitement, as they were a special gift for my daughter, who is a big fan of the movie. However, the experience was completely disappointing from the moment I opened the package. When I took them out, I noticed that the box was broken and visibly damaged, as if it had suffered several impacts during shipping. Not only was it deformed, but it also looked like it had been handled carelessly.The product’s presentation is an important part, especially when it’s a gift, and this damaged box completely took away the charm. I couldn’t even give it to my daughter with the excitement I had hoped for. I also had to spend time looking for a last-minute alternative so she wouldn’t be disappointed. I believe that a product aimed at children and presented as an "ideal gift" should have better protection to avoid these kinds of issues.Please consider improving the packaging or taking additional precautions in shipping. I would not recommend this product if you plan to give it as a gift; the risk of receiving it in poor condition is very high and ends up ruining the experience.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2024
reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanna Fanta, Don't You Wanna?
reviewText: I was drawn in by the photos that showed the Fanta can-sized case, but it turns out that picture must have been photoshopped. I was expecting something the size of a mini Coke can, which would’ve been perfect for my car's cup holder. Unfortunately, the case is much smaller than that, which was a letdown.As for the earbuds themselves, they work fine, about what you’d expect for this price range, but they’re not exactly premium quality. The case is cute, and it comes with a very short USB-A to USB-C charging cable, instructions, and the earbuds themselves. They start charging as soon as you put them in the case, and they don’t take too long to power up, which is nice. The soda can case has a USB-C port with a rubber cover and an indicator LED to show the charging status.The touch controls on the earbuds are simple—one tap to play/pause, double tap on the right to increase volume, and double tap on the left to lower it. They fit snugly in my ears and don’t fall out, but don’t expect any sound isolation.All in all, the product photos were a bit misleading, and I feel a bit tricked. If I had known the real size and quality, I wouldn’t have bought them.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2024
reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Official Diet Coke Earbuds
reviewText: This pair of diet coke earbuds has ups and downs.The earbuds comes in a branded box as shown in my first picture with the soda can charging case, pair of earbuds, instructions/information paper, and a very very short USB-A to USB-C charging cable.When you put them in the charging case they immediately start charging and don't take terribly long to charge. I haven't used them a ton but that will come in my downsides. The top of the soda can has a USB-C charging port covered with a rubber cover and it also has a indicator led next to it to show if it is charging or finished.There are touch controls on the ear buds, such as tap once to play/pause, double tap on the right to turn the volume up and double tap the left to turn it down.The earbuds actually fit and stay very well in my ears without coming loose but there is no sound isolation or anything on these.Moving to the downsides, as I just mentioned there is no sound isolation or seal that this forms in your ear so you will hear everything around you and if you have these loud enough, anyone around can probably hear what you are listening to as well. That also brings me to the sound quality, it's just not great. Using a 20$ "gaming" headset produced better clearer sound with more bass than these could produce. I also noticed a few milliseconds of delay between what I see and hear if I connected them to a computer.The soda can isn't the easiest to open to put these back in for charging. There is little to nowhere to grab and because the magnets are good, it stays sealed.For some reason when you use these earbuds via Bluetooth, they ALWAYS are flashing blue on each ear bud to signify they are connected.Overall, not the best headphones but they are official and even in the bluetooth list they show up as "diet coke earbuds" which to me is fantastic so I know what I'm connecting to. The sound quality just isn't the best, the soda can isn't the easiest to open, and the constant flashing blue lights on the earbuds isn't great either. However, they do fit my ears very well, the touch/tap controls work as they should, and they last a decent amount of time just listening to music and other audio.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024
reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than I thought
reviewText: There is a picture where they detail the measurements in millimeters, and in that same picture they show the can in someone’s hand but it must be photoshopped because I got the sense these were the size of a coke mini can. That was kind of what I was hoping for; not that the earbuds would be ginormous, but that the case, sitting in my cars cup holder could be mistaken for a coke. These are too small for that.Otherwise, they work fine. They’re as good as anything in this price point but not much bigger than other earbud cases.While the words didn’t technically lie, I find this product page a bit misleading based on the photoshopped product shots. I’ll own my part in falling for it, but is that how you want to buy products? Knowing what I know now, I wouldn’t buy again.My rating system breakdown:1 Star = Safety hazard, gross misrepresentation of product, or flat out doesn't work2 Stars = Needs improvement3 Stars = Meh, likely wouldn't buy again.4 Stars = Meets expectations5 Stars = Exceeds expectations

reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for a collector
reviewText: These Pokemon earbuds come in two complete sets. They're touch control and Bluetooth to your device. They're loud and they do charge fast and they have mic's on them so you can use your phone in hands free mode. They're lightweight and work good.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good at a low price point. Great bluetooth range.
reviewText: Obviously these are not high-end studio headphones. But for low-end earbuds, they are pretty good. They are certainly louder than other similarly-priced earbuds, which is good because some brands are so quiet that you have trouble hearing on a plane, for example. Also, the bluetooth worked flawlessly over 30 feet away, which was very good, and better than many products that cost over twice as much. That's convenient if you want to walk around a large room and just leave your phone or PC where it is and not have to move it.The rubber covers on the earbuds fit well enough, although other brands are tighter. There is another set of differently-shaped rubber covers, which is a nice touch, but they appear to be for even smaller ears, so I didn't try them. It also comes with a USB charging cable (without the AC wall plug) and also pairing instructions which were very easy to follow but with tiny writing. Please manufacturers, try to make writing in a larger font for people with poor eyesight.The sound quality was mixed. For piano and acapella female voice, they are quite good. That higher end of the range is pretty exceptional, to be honest. But, as with most cheaper earbuds, the sound quality goes down as they get into lower sounds like bass. These do seem to be bass-boosted, which is nice but also leaves a "hole" at the lower midrange. But again, bass boosted seems better than not bass boosted at this price point.The charging pods are cute and seem to work well. And you get two sets, good for two kids to each have their own identical ones with a different color so there is no fighting. As a parent of two kids, this is very important.All in all, this is a very good product for the lower end.

reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice price for two sets of decent, but not great, earbuds
reviewText: I got these earbuds, not for kids, but for my husband and myself. My husband is clearly more of a tech user than I am and has been trying out these earbuds for awhile now (whereas I just don't like having things in my ears, these are no exception, and I find them quite uncomfortable).Observations from my husband:He likes having a USB-C port (others he has had recently had an older USB format)The strap adds versatility and the fairly compact size makes carrying along easierNot a secure fit in the ears (I will second this)When compared to other earbuds, it has more treble and less bass sound than many--will depend on how you use them as to whether this is a plus or minusThe case has the feel and function like it won't last longThe print on the instructions is too small for many people to read. He had to use his phone's magnifier to read it. The instructions need to refer to the same item consistently by the same name. For example, the "headset power box" is also referred to as a bin and a compartmentThe function button is too easy to touch and be activated when the earbuds are put in the ears. The button also doesn't always do what is expected. One short touch typically powers off the earbud rather than pause what one is listening to
